subject: Check commission payments for November
description_text:
Dear Partner,

I hope you are doing well. I am writing to kindly follow up on the November
commission, which was previously scheduled to be paid in January due to the
30-day refund period. As of now, I have not yet received the payment.

I would appreciate it if you could kindly check and let me know the current
status. Thank you very much for your support.

Best regards
